<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This pass uses inrange annotations on GEP indices to split globals where</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// beneficial. Clang currently attaches these annotations to references to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// virtual table globals under the Itanium ABI for the benefit of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// whole-program virtual call optimization and control flow integrity passes.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check that the GEP offset is in the range (treating upper bound as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// inclusive here).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!SrcInRange.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantrange/#aaca3a4d2b25c24b11179cbd01079b73c">contains</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>) &amp;&amp; SrcInRange.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantrange/#aa1955c426e1ff66455b4bb6657ee995d">getUpper</a>() != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Find which struct member the range corresponds to.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SrcInRange.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantrange/#a23f4339e49343721146062b10c144052">getLower</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#af4b1ccc0b78f9da9f3f3944e06007f1d">uge</a>(SL-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/structlayout/#a0b6603d0838e3b40bf5c0a403c0510f2">getSizeInBytes</a>()))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MemberIndex =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlight">        SL-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/structlayout/#a331caeb70809f50e71528de06fba7b66">getElementContainingOffset</a>(SrcInRange.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantrange/#a23f4339e49343721146062b10c144052">getLower</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a217e0207d9cc8e046c2dccbf0e4bb198">getZExtValue</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/typesize">TypeSize</a> MemberStart = MemberOffsets&#91;MemberIndex&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/typesize">TypeSize</a> MemberEnd = MemberIndex == MemberOffsets.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a85ffb6531d4cda988ea81f18d4e56fb7">size</a>() - 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlight">                             ? SL-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/structlayout/#a0b6603d0838e3b40bf5c0a403c0510f2">getSizeInBytes</a>()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">                             : MemberOffsets&#91;MemberIndex + 1&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Verify that the range matches that struct member.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SrcInRange.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantrange/#a23f4339e49343721146062b10c144052">getLower</a>() != MemberStart ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">        SrcInRange.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantrange/#aa1955c426e1ff66455b4bb6657ee995d">getUpper</a>() != MemberEnd)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SplitBegin = SL-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/structlayout/#a3932cc53acb297750961bfdaa86425bc">getElementOffset</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Rebuild type metadata, adjusting by the split offset.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: See if we can use DW&#95;OP&#95;piece to preserve debug metadata here.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdnode">MDNode</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> : Types) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlight">      uint64&#95;t ByteOffset = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;ConstantInt&gt;</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlight">              <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;ConstantAsMetadata&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a>-&gt;getOperand(0))-&gt;getValue())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlight">              -&gt;getZExtValue();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Type metadata may be attached one byte after the end of the vtable, for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// classes without virtual methods in Itanium ABI. AFAIK, it is never</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// attached to the first byte of a vtable. Subtract one to get the right</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// slice.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is making an assumption that vtable groups are the only kinds of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// global variables that !type metadata can be attached to, and that they</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// are either Itanium ABI vtable groups or contain a single vtable (i.e.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Microsoft ABI vtables).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">      uint64&#95;t AttachedTo = (ByteOffset == 0) ? ByteOffset : ByteOffset - 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (AttachedTo &lt; SplitBegin || AttachedTo &gt;= SplitEnd)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">      SplitGV-&gt;addMetadata(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlight">          LLVMContext::MD&#95;type,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdnode/#a7d10a7b9b7f40b04d27ed97c38ea1950">MDNode::get</a>(GV.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#ab3fc0225d8aaf8434026c3573f961f2c">getContext</a>(),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">                       &#123;ConstantAsMetadata::get(</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">                        Type-&gt;getOperand(1)&#125;));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlight">      SplitGV-&gt;setVCallVisibilityMetadata(GV.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalobject/#a8eed548b25235cac65c22832aeb628fc">getVCallVisibility</a>());</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Finally, remove the original global. Any remaining uses refer to invalid</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// elements of the global, so replace with poison.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!GV.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a9d7de807ebdfe1819df3ff6cb0f16158">use&#95;empty</a>())</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">  GV.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalvariable/#ae0cf03d5de37330b1eb69dd22a1d5057">eraseFromParent</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171" lineLink="#a93898976321fdcdb6827b4885b0d435c"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a93898976321fdcdb6827b4885b0d435c">splitGlobals</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> &amp;M) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// First, see if the module uses either of the llvm.type.test or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// llvm.type.checked.load intrinsics, which indicates that splitting globals</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// may be beneficial.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &#42;TypeTestFunc =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/intrinsic/#aa1731508126b77035ab3ba9d71d5374b">Intrinsic::getDeclarationIfExists</a>(&amp;M, Intrinsic::type&#95;test);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &#42;TypeCheckedLoadFunc =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/intrinsic/#aa1731508126b77035ab3ba9d71d5374b">Intrinsic::getDeclarationIfExists</a>(&amp;M, Intrinsic::type&#95;checked&#95;load);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &#42;TypeCheckedLoadRelativeFunc = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/intrinsic/#aa1731508126b77035ab3ba9d71d5374b">Intrinsic::getDeclarationIfExists</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &amp;M, Intrinsic::type&#95;checked&#95;load&#95;relative);</span></CodeLine>
